Package plugins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeDataScale
    This tool can be used to change the data scale of a raster image.
    ChangeDataType
    This tool can be used to change the data type of a raster image.
    ConvertNoDataToZero
    This tool can be used to change the value within the grid cells of a raster file that contain NoData to zero.
    CoordinateSystemTransformation
    This tool can be used to convert raster data that is in geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude) into the UTM projected coordinate system or vice versa.
    RasterToVectorLines
    This tool converts a raster dataset containing one or more single-cell wide line networks into a vector shapefile.
    RasterToVectorPoints
    Converts a raster dataset to a shapefile of the Point shapetype.
    RasterToVectorPolygons
    Converts a raster dataset to a shapefile of the Polygon shapetype.
    SetNoData
    This tool will re-assign a user-defined background value in an input raster image the NoData value.
    VectorLinesToRaster
    This tool can be used to convert a vector lines or polygon file (shapefile) into a raster grid of lines.
    VectorPointsToRaster
    This tool can be used to convert a vector points file (shapefile) into a raster grid.
    VectorPolygonsToRaster
    This tool can be used to convert a vector polygons file (shapefile) into a raster grid.
    XYZTextToRaster
    This tool will convert an ASCII text file containing X,Y,Z point data into a raster image.
